text: Hi! Is it possible to have a drop-down menu in a module where you select a certain field within a table that is pre-selected by the developer?
I know you can use the module.hubdbtable_field but that only lets the designer to select the table
What I'd like to do is have the designer select a customer (one row in my "Customers" table) so that a sidebar on a Customer page gets populated with the customers logo and other related information
would I need to generate a drop-down menu through iteration of the rows in the customers table?
